page.title: 14FESTIVALS IN HURST GREEN
page.content: Hurst Green is quite a growing area. Houses and estates are making new homes for outsiders. Therefore there is a greater need for clubs and activities. Every year in June{Moor House School} holds a fete. It includes competitions, family events, small zoo and games. Also every year a fair is held in{St Agatha's Hall.}A theme is chosen. Every year Guides, Scouts, Brownies and Cubs dress up. The activities are games and competitions. There may be an ambulance or fire engine to inspect. All stalls are held by charitable groups. These fairs are helped by Churches. The Methodist provides services for children with club facilities. A family service lasts 1 hour with children leaving after 15 minutes to attend Sunday School.
